description:
Ever have that one annoying person that just won't stop talking! Ever just want to SCREAM at them to SHUT UP! but just can't! Well now you can, with your neat and dandy SHUT UP app! Simply tap the giant shut up button and BANG! your device does the work for you by yelling a loud voice of SHUT UP!
Like free apps? Help support with other apps too!
Check out other great apps by KDB Productions like Love Test!, Finger Print Scanner!, Dictionary FREE!, Extreme Launcher, Shut up!, and The Ultimate Strobe Light!
